meanings.sent1: The cat's fur was the splodgiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The painting was the splodgiest one in the entire gallery.
meanings.sent3: The splodgiest cake I've ever baked turned out to be the most delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her notebook looked like the splodgiest map of a magical land.
meanings.sent5: The artist used the splodgiest colors to create a vibrant masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the paintings, hers was the splodgiest.
meanings.sent2: The splodgiest in the group was easy to spot.
meanings.sent3: The splodgiest of the cupcakes was the first to disappear at the party.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the splodgiest artist in town.
meanings.sent5: The little puppy was the splodgiest of all his siblings.
